boardgame.name: Le Fantôme de l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Opéra
boardgame.description: Le Fant_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ocirc;me de l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;Op_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ra is a two-player game based on the Mr. Jack game system _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; that is, the game is an asymmetric affair in which one player wants to reveal which suspect token on the game board represents the opponent, with both players taking turns moving all of the suspects to alternately reveal and hide information. That said, the game differs in a number of ways from Mr. Jack. In more detail..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Le Fant_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ocirc;me de l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;Op_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ra, eight suspect tokens stand in the ten rooms of the Op_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ra Garnier. Each suspect has a reason to drive the opera singer La Carlotta away from the production, and at the start of the game one of the suspects is randomly determined to be the true identity of the Phantom player. The other player is the Investigator, and he wants to discover the Phantom's identity; if he does so before La Carlotta flees the Op_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ra Garnier, then he wins. Otherwise, he loses. (To balance play between newcomers and experienced players La Carlotta's starting position can changed.)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of each odd round, eight suspect cards are shuffled and four of them revealed. The Investigator moves one suspect and (likely) uses this suspect's unique ability, then the Phantom moves two of the remaining three suspects, then the Investigator moves the final suspect. The Phantom player then reveals whether he can or cannot cause a disturbance in the Op_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ra Garnier, thus scaring La Carlotta; he can cause a disturbance only if he's alone or if he's in the room with the blackout token. If he can cause a disturbance, the Investigator clears all suspects sharing a lit room; if not, the Investigator clears all suspects in the dark or on their own. After this, La Carlotta moves one step closer to fleeing for each suspect that hasn't been declared innocent (and an additional step if the Phantom did create a disturbance)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For each even round, the remaining four suspect cards are revealed, and the players again move characters and use their special abilities, with the Phantom going first. The game continues until only a single suspect is not innocent or La Carlotta flees France for the safety of Milan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When a character moves, it can move up to as many spaces as the number of characters in the room from which it moves. Most characters can move only through open corridors, but Meg Giry can use secret passageways that connect many of the rooms. The players must use Meg's ability and the other characters' special abilities to hide or reveal information. One character, for example, moves a padlock that blocks one corridor, while another is responsible for the roaming blackout that allows the Phantom to operate in darkness (or at least provide cover for his activity elsewhere). One sweet character can draw everyone from adjacent rooms to her side, while an unpleasant fellow can drive everyone away. Still another reveals (or hides) an alibi card, clearing one suspect (or keeping his true nature unknown). Every character is useful in the right situation. You just have to learn what those situations are..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 5 - Camp Abeartoir Part 7: The Final Beginning

Asmodee (ASMPAO01) The opera house is clearly haunted, and the ghost wants to drive off La Carlotta, the lead diva. Chandeliers fall, strange voices come out of the shadows, and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s only a matter of time before she leaves Paris forever. Play as the Phantom and scare off the opera singer, or play as the investigator and discover the true identity of the fiend before it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s too late! Phantom of the Opera is a game of cat-and-mouse - a two-player battle of wits. The Phantom and the investigator will take turns moving the various suspects and using their unique abilities. The investigator hopes to narrow down the suspects to catch the villain, while the Phantom must elude his pursuer and drive the diva from the stage!

Brand new, never opened and never played. Gotta clear some games out to make room for new ones, so my loss is your gain. Shipping is $6.00. If you purchase more than one game I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to consolidate packages to save shipping . Paypal only please. And sorry, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t sell to buyers outside of the US.
Reserved for auction winner jlrothe.

Great 2 players asymmetric deduction game. - each character has a special ability and they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re pretty fun - it plays fast, is easy to learn and works great as a family game - it feels thematic - you can add handicap to either player, which is great for newbies vs experienced players for instance
